text: I can’t read half of the module names because of how the blocks are. Dragging and moving around modules is pretty terrible. If you are using a flex column and do “add module” form the content tab (to not deal with the ui issues) then the search defaults to all modules instead of the themes one. This UI is preferred over the add, I believe.  I think it is also missing clone module which would be great. Maybe I’m just using it wrong?

Agreed, flex columns haven’t got a lot of love recently, most of our UI / UX improvements have been around dnd areas (you can clone, modules “drop zones” don’t shift modules around, etc). For the module names thing, are the module names truncated? If so, we should have a fix out somewhat soon that atleast shows you a tooltip showing the full name.
yeah, they are truncated. hover tooltip would be great on that
